item.title: Meta 的高科技 Oakleys 为运动人群带来智能眼镜
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司为其智能眼镜赋予了运动风格和更高的价格。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is giving its smart glasses a premium, athletic twist — and a higher price tag.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚企业警告石油公司劳动改革将导致裁员和成本上升
item.description: 哥伦比亚的保安公司和医院警告说，由于总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）推动提高工人福利的连锁效应，将出现裁员和成本激增。【原文：Colombia’s security firms and hospitals are warning of job cuts and surging costs as a knock-on effect of President Gustavo Petro’s push to boost worker benefits.】

item.title: CoreWeave 计划出售 15 亿美元债券为债务再融资
item.description: 据一份新闻稿称，人工智能计算能力提供商 CoreWeave 公司计划发行 15 亿美元的优先票据，部分资金将用于债务再融资。【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a provider of AI computing power, plans to offer $1.5 billion of senior notes that will be used in part to refinance debt, according to a release.】

item.title: 西藏大坝对中国 GDP 的贡献远大于电力供应
item.description:
该国计划在喜马拉雅山修建一个水力发电项目，其发电量超过波兰全国的发电量。【原文：

The nation plans to build a hydropower project in the Himalayas with more capacity than all of Poland.

】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司收购人工智能公司，帮助公用事业公司检查电网损坏情况
item.description: GE Vernova 公司正在收购法国软件公司 Alteia SAS，这家发电设备制造商希望利用人工智能加强电网建设。【原文：GE Vernova Inc. is acquiring French software company Alteia SAS as the maker of power generation equipment looks to use artificial intelligence for ways to strengthen the electric grid.】

item.title: 新泽西州和纽约市有望从举办世界杯中获益 33 亿美元
item.description: 纽约市和新泽西州官员预计，2026 年举办国际足联世界杯将为该地区带来 33 亿美元的经济增长。【原文：New York City and New Jersey officials are projecting a $3.3 billion economic boost to the region from hosting the FIFA World Cup in 2026.】

item.title: 以色列打击胡塞武装在也门港口的目标以阻止导弹发射
item.description: 周一，以色列袭击了胡塞武装在也门荷台达港的目标，以报复该组织在上周发射的一系列导弹。【原文：Israel struck Houthi targets in Yemen’s port of Hodeida on Monday, in retaliation for a series of missile volleys from the group over the last week.】

item.title: X 表示将抵制 "出于政治动机 "的法国调查
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司表示，在对社交媒体平台算法涉嫌存在偏见和操纵行为的调查中，它不会满足法国当局的要求。【原文：Elon Musk’s X said it won’t accede to French authorities’ demands in a probe into alleged bias and manipulation of the social media platform’s algorithm.】

item.title: 中国制造的 F-7 战斗机在孟加拉国撞毁学校，16 人丧生
item.description: 周一，一架中国制造的 F-7 飞机坠毁在孟加拉国的一所学校，造成至少 16 人死亡，数十人受伤。【原文：A Chinese-made F-7 jet crashed into a school in Bangladesh on Monday, killing at least 16 people and injuring dozens more.】

item.title: 科技公司首席执行官和风险投资人对英国征收财富税的风声望而却步
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，孙亚洲将关注围绕英国财富税传闻的争论。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Yazhou Sun looks into the debate around a rumored wealth tax in the UK.】

item.title: 博思艾伦风险投资公司将向国防科技初创企业投资 2 亿美元
item.description: 博思艾伦汉密尔顿控股公司（Booz Allen Hamilton Holding Corp.【原文：Booz Allen Hamilton Holding Corp. is committing $200 million to its venture capital arm, deepening its work with defense tech startups working on drones, artificial intelligence and other tools.】

item.title: 博弈世界对特朗普关税的反应
item.description: 全世界都在拭目以待，看美国总统唐纳德-特朗普如何兑现他在 8 月 1 日增加关税的威胁。这意味着美国之外的某种无奈。然而，世界其他地区如何应对美国自1930年以来最大的保护主义转变，最终可能会像特朗普的炮火一样决定全球经济的后果。【原文：The world is watching and waiting to see just how President Donald Trump chooses to deliver on his threats to increase tariffs Aug. 1. That implies a certain helplessness outside the US. And yet how the rest of the world reacts to what is already the biggest turn in American protectionism since 1930 may end up defining the consequences for the global economy as much as Trump’s salvos.】

item.title: Verizon 营收理想，因税改上调盈利预期
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 公布的第二季度营收超过了分析师的预期，并上调了利润展望，这主要是受无线通信价格上涨和近期税收立法的影响。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. posted second-quarter revenue that surpassed analysts’ estimates and raised its profit outlook, buoyed by wireless price increases and recent tax legislation.】

item.title: Adobe 交易失败后，Figma 和支持者寻求首次公开募股 10.3 亿美元
item.description: Figma Inc.及其部分投资者正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 10.3 亿美元的资金，这家应用设计和协作软件公司正在为今年最大的上市活动做准备。【原文：Figma Inc. and some of its investors are seeking to raise as much as $1.03 billion in a US initial public offering, as the app design and collaboration software company readies what could be one of the biggest listings of the year.】

item.title: 关税担忧加剧避险需求，国债走高
item.description: 国债上涨，追随欧洲债券的涨势，原因是美国关税最后期限的临近刺激了避险资产的需求。【原文：Treasury rose, tracking gains in European bonds, as the looming deadline on US tariffs fanned demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 美国最大规模的售电活动将让消费者了解人工智能的成本
item.description: 规模最大、最受关注的美国电力拍卖将提前揭示人工智能热潮将给消费者带来的损失。【原文：The biggest and most closely watched US power auction is set to offer an early glimpse of what the AI boom will cost consumers.】

item.title: 伊朗在与欧洲举行核会议之前排除美国会谈的可能性
item.description: 尽管伊朗准备在本周与欧洲、俄罗斯和中国官员就其原子项目进行讨论，但它仍表示不打算与美国恢复核谈判。【原文：Iran said it has no plans to resume nuclear talks with the US even as it prepares to hold discussions on its atomic program with European, Russian, and Chinese officials this week.】

item.title: 经济学家认为加拿大今年进一步降息的可能性较小
item.description: 加拿大央行今年进一步降息的预期正在慢慢消失。【原文：Expectations for further interest rate cuts this year from the Bank of Canada are slowly evaporating.】

item.title: 亚马逊股价下跌，投资者寻找人工智能提升迹象
item.description: 如今，人工智能领域的激进投资在股票市场上获得了丰厚回报。但在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Aggressive spending on artificial intelligence is mostly being rewarded in the stock market these days. But when it comes to Amazon.com Inc., not so much.】

item.title: 富国银行与 Centerbridge 达成 48 亿美元贷款合资协议
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：A direct lending partnership between Wells Fargo & Co. and Centerbridge Partners has arranged $2 billion in deals since the start of this year, bringing its total amount deployed to-date to $4.8 billion, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 欧洲对俄罗斯柴油的新制裁要到一月才会生效
item.description: 欧盟表示，旨在限制俄罗斯原油燃料流动的一系列新措施要到 1 月份才会生效，这缓解了一些人对这些措施将收紧本已强劲的柴油市场的担忧。【原文：The European Union said a new set of measures aimed at restricting the flow of fuel made from Russian crude won’t take effect until January, easing some concerns that they would tighten an already strong diesel market.】

item.title: 纯属虚构提醒瑞士信贷注意古普塔的档案材料
item.description: 瑞士信贷银行高管桌上的报告是一枚重磅炸弹：报告称，全球钢铁大亨、该银行的主要借款人之一桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）是一起数十亿美元欺诈案的 "明确参与者"。【原文：The report that landed on the desks of Credit Suisse executives was a bombshell: Sanjeev Gupta, a global steel tycoon and one of the bank’s key borrowers, was a “clear participant” in a multi-billion dollar fraud, it claimed.】

item.title: 波兰寻求获得监控卫星制造商 Iceye 的股份
item.description: 波兰正在采取措施购买芬兰私营先进地球观测卫星制造商 Iceye Oy 的股份。【原文：Poland is taking steps to purchase a stake in privately-held Iceye Oy, the Finnish maker of advanced Earth-observation satellites.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数发出美股反弹势头减弱的信号
item.description: 在美国股市本月屡创新高的表象下，有迹象表明反弹的动力正在耗尽。【原文：Under the surface of the US stock market’s march to record highs this month, there are signs the rally is running out of gas.】

item.title: 邦菲格里奥利印度分公司据说考虑 2.5 亿美元首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利齿轮制造商邦飞利集团（Bonfiglioli Group）的印度分部正在考虑在孟买进行首次公开募股，可能会筹集约 2.5 亿美元。【原文：The Indian unit of Italian gearmaker Bonfiglioli Group is considering an initial public offering in Mumbai that may raise about $250 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港地铁寻求贷款支持北环铁路项目
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港铁路运营商港铁公司正在与银行洽谈潜在贷款事宜，以支持其北环线铁路项目的开发。【原文：Hong Kong railway operator MTR Corp. is in talks with banks for a potential loan to support development of its Northern Link rail project, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将从 11 月起全面发布月度通胀报告
item.description: 澳大利亚将从 11 月 26 日开始公布完整的月度通胀指标，以解决该国经济数据中长期存在的一个缺口。【原文：Australia will begin publishing a complete monthly measure of inflation from Nov. 26, addressing a long-standing gap in the nation’s economic data.】

item.title: 日本右翼政党的得势有可能令全球投资者感到不安
item.description: 日本右翼政党三胞党在周日的上议院选举中获胜，这有可能令全球投资者感到不安，而全球投资者一直是日本股市最有力的支持者之一。【原文：The success of Japanese right-wing party Sanseito in Sunday’s upper house election has the potential to unnerve global investors, who have been among the strongest supporters of the nation’s equity markets.】
